participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Liam tends to be introspective but enjoys sharing his thoughts with others. He is nurturing, especially with plants, and has a playful side despite his fears.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and imaginative, Margaret has a bold personality that shines through her ambitions to create a better world. She often reflects on her past experiences as a painter.
participant_2.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i have two grown children who never visit.
